name: Evelyn
agent_background:
Evelyn is the manager and personal bodyguard of Ridu's most iconic singer, Astra Yao. Known for her calm, decisive decision-making and professional, efficient style, she's an irreplaceable pillar behind Astra. "In terms of commercial value, if Astra Yao represents the 1, then Evelyn is all the 0s that follow," a reporter from an entertainment magazine stated.

Evelyn is skilled at planning comprehensive schedules and product endorsements, while also ensuring Astra Yao's safety during any unexpected situations. "Want to get close to Astra Yao? You'll have to get past Evelyn Chevalier first..." Though she's always busy with work, Evelyn never seems overwhelmed, and she has an almost obsessive attention to detail, ensuring that every performance and every product endorsement goes through her strict scrutiny. But strangely, such an exceptional manager is not trusted by her parent company, Odeum HAE.

Intel: Evelyn's role seems to go beyond just being a manager and personal bodyguard; there seems to be an "organization" behind her.

It seems a lot of people in Astra Yao's central Astranauts group ship them together.

basic_attack.name: Passive: Bind
basic_attack.description:
When Evelyn uses her skills to deal DMG to enemies, she will accumulate Burning Embers.
When Evelyn consumes Burning Embers to activate Garrote or consumes Decibels to perform an Ultimate, she gains 1 Burning Tether Point.
Once Evelyn has 3 Burning Tether Points, her next use of Garrote will consume all Burning Tether Points to instead use a lower Interrupt Level version of Chain Attack: Lunalux - Snare.

basic_attack.name: Razor Wire
basic_attack.description:
Launch up to five attacks ahead, dealing Physical DMG and Fire DMG.
When the 5th hit lands against an enemy, Evelyn will use her Lunalux Garrote to bind the primary target and enter Binding Seal.

basic_attack.name: Garrote - First Form
basic_attack.description:
When Burning Embers is at 50% or higher, hold Basic Attack or Special Attack to activate:
Consume 50% Burning Embers to use Lunalux Garrote to perform a slashing attack, dealing Fire DMG.
During skill activation, Anti-Interrupt level increases, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.
After using this skill, gain 1 Burning Tether Point.

basic_attack.name: Garrote - Second Form
basic_attack.description:
When Burning Embers is 50% or higher, after using Basic Attack: Garrote - First Form, continue to hold Basic Attack or Special Attack to activate:
Consume 50% Burning Embers to use Lunalux Garrote to perform a follow-up attack, dealing Fire DMG.
During skill activation, Anti-Interrupt level increases, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.
After using this skill, gain 1 Burning Tether Point.

dodge.name: Arc Step
dodge.description:
A quick dash dodge.

Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

dash_attack.name: Piercing Ambush
dash_attack.description: Deliver a kick to the enemy in front, causing Physical DMG.

dodge_counter.name: Strangling Reversal

quick_assist.name: Fierce Blade
quick_assist.description:
Use Lunalux Garrote to slash surrounding enemies, dealing Fire DMG.
When the attack hits an enemy, Evelyn will use Lunalux Garrote to bind the primary target and enter Binding Seal.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

defensive_assist.name: Silent Protection
defensive_assist.description:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

assist_follow_up.name: Course Disruption
assist_follow_up.description:
Evelyn slashes with Lunalux Garrote, then triggers an explosion ahead, dealing Fire DMG.
When the attack hits an enemy, Evelyn will use Lunalux Garrote to bind the primary target and enter Binding Seal.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

special_attack.name: Locked Position
special_attack.description:
Before entering Binding Seal, press Special Attack or EX Special Attack to activate:
Use Lunalux Garrote to pull the enemy and charge forward with a kick, dealing Fire DMG.
When the attack hits the enemy, Evelyn will use Lunalux Garrote to bind the primary target and enter Binding Seal.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

special_attack.name: Binding Sunder - First Form
special_attack.description:
After entering Binding Seal, press or hold Special Attack to activate:
Centered on the target affected by Binding Seal, tether surrounding enemies and detonate an explosion, dealing Fire DMG. Binding Seal will end after detonation.
Dodge enemy attacks upon activating the skill, and if a Perfect Dodge is triggered, gain an additional 25% Burning Embers.
After tethering surrounding enemies, press Basic Attack to cancel detonation and immediately follow up with the Basic Attack's 3rd hit.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

ex_special_attack.name: Binding Sunder - Final Form
ex_special_attack.description:
After entering Binding Seal and with enough Energy, press or hold EX Special Attack to activate:
Centered on the target affected by Binding Seal, tether surrounding enemies and detonate an explosion, dealing massive Fire DMG. Binding Seal will end after detonation.
Dodge enemy attacks upon activating the skill, and if a Perfect Dodge is triggered, gain an additional 25% Burning Embers.
After pulling in surrounding enemies, press Basic Attack to cancel detonation and immediately follow up with the Basic Attack's 3rd hit.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

chain_attack.name: Lunalux - Snare
chain_attack.description:
Evelyn slashes in front with multiple Lunalux Garrotes and detonates an explosion, dealing massive Fire DMG to enemies in the area.
When the attack hits an enemy, Evelyn uses Lunalux Garrote to bind the primary target and enters Binding Seal.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

ultimate.name: Lunalux Garrote - Timbre
ultimate.description:
Evelyn slashes in front with multiple Lunalux Garrotes and detonates an explosion, dealing massive Fire DMG to enemies in the area.
Upon activating this skill, Evelyn removes her jacket and enters the Dance of Awakened Fire state, which lasts for the entire battle. While in the Dance of Awakened Fire state, when Evelyn consumes Burning Tether Points to activate Chain Attack: Lunalux - Snare, she will retain 1 point of Burning Tether Point. When the attack hits an enemy, Evelyn uses Lunalux Garrote to bind the primary target, entering Binding Seal.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, gain 1 Burning Tether Point.

ultimate.name: Lunalux Garrote - Shadow
ultimate.description:
While under the Dance of Awakened Fire state, and when Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press Ultimate Colored to activate:
Evelyn slashes in front with multiple Lunalux Garrotes and detonates an explosion, dealing massive Fire DMG to enemies in the area.
When the attack hits an enemy, Evelyn uses Lunalux Garrote to bind the primary target and enters Binding Seal.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, gain 1 Burning Tether Point.

core_passive.name: Entangle
core_passive.description: Upon entering Binding Seal, Evelyn's CRIT Rate increases by 25%. After leaving Binding Seal, she retains the buff for 10s. If Evelyn switches to another character while in Binding Seal, she will automatically follow up with Special Attack: Binding Sunder - First Form.

additional_ability.name: Ambush Point
additional_ability.description:
When another character in your squad is a Stun or Support character:
Evelyn's Chain Attack and Ultimate DMG increases by 30%. When Evelyn's CRIT Rate is at or over 80%, the DMG multiplier for her Chain Attack and Ultimate increases to 125% of the original value.

mindscape_cinema.name: Dreamweave
mindscape_cinema.description:
Upon entering the battlefield, Evelyn immediately gains 1,500 Decibels.
Enemies affected by Binding Seal will be Bound. When Evelyn attacks Bound enemies, she ignores 12% of their DEF.
When Evelyn uses Special Attack: Binding Sunder - First Form or EX Special Attack: Binding Sunder - Final Form, the Bound effect spreads to all enemies hit by the skill. This spread Bound effect lasts for 10s.

mindscape_cinema.name: Dance of Fire
mindscape_cinema.description:
Evelyn's ATK increases by 15%.
When Evelyn uses Basic Attack: Garrote - First Form or Basic Attack: Garrote - Second Form, the Burning Embers consumed will be returned. This effect can trigger once every 25s.
When Evelyn consumes Burning Tether Point to trigger Chain Attack: Lunalux - Snare, the skill's Interrupt Level increases.

mindscape_cinema.name: Metamorphosis
mindscape_cinema.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Assist, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

mindscape_cinema.name: Fate's Melody
mindscape_cinema.description: Upon activating a Chain Attack or Ultimate, Evelyn immediately gains a shield equal to 10% of her Max HP. While this shield exists, Evelyn's CRIT DMG increases by 40%.

mindscape_cinema.name: Crimson Threads Like the Dawn
mindscape_cinema.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Assist, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

mindscape_cinema.name: Bond of Light and Shadow
mindscape_cinema.description:
When activating her Chain Attack or Ultimate, Evelyn gains Shadowstring Edge for 20s.
During Shadowstring Edge, when Evelyn hits enemies with a Basic Attack, Dash Attack, Special Attack, or EX Special Attack, an additional Lunalux Garrote will be released for a follow-up attack, dealing Fire DMG equal to 375% of Evelyn's ATK. This DMG is considered Chain Attack DMG and can trigger up to 16 times. The number of triggers will be refreshed each time Shadowstring Edge is gained.
